hello ray
  wow that is a very interesting find.might i suggest you contact scott rodell at seven stars trading co. he knows a bit about korean and chinese blades and have known to come across a few.here is the link to his site and contact info.i have had several conversations with him about antique chinese blades and korean blades.he is a very friendly helpful guy. link:  http://www.sevenstarstrading.com/

   john white
